When not set, allows the normal suspension behavior of notification observers to take place.[`static var deliverImmediately: DistributedNotificationCenter.Options`](/documentation/foundation/distributednotificationcenter/options/deliverimmediately)[`let NSNotificationPostToAllSessions: DistributedNotificationCenter.Options`](/documentation/foundation/nsnotificationposttoallsessions)When set, the notification is posted to all sessions.
